newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey's Emlakbank to set up bank in Germany.
newsitem.headline: Turkey's Emlakbank to set up bank in Germany.

text.p: T. Emlak Bankasi A.S., one of Turkey's largest state-owned banks specialising in real estate development and financing, said on Thursday it planned to set up a new bank in Germany.

Emlakbank said it had gained preliminary permission from German authorities to found a bank in Germany in cooperation with the European Turkish businessmen's association (ATIAD) and would begin in September 1997.
The bank also said it began procedures to open a branch office in New York and that it was starting off-shore facilities and establishing a branch in northern Cyprus.
The bank said the moves were part of its efforts to expand activities in commercial banking and foreign trade finance.
